category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_set_GADSL_flag_during_validation
preference.preference_description: Indicates if the Teamcenter set GADSL (Global Automotive Declarable Substance List) flag to true on Material object during validation. The default value is "false"
